reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez explains complex concepts clearly. Her enthusiasm for the subject is contagious.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Lectures can be dry, but the content is interesting. More interactive sessions would help.

reviews.subject: Artificial Intelligence
reviews.review: Brilliant professor! Dr. Lee's practical approach and industry insights are invaluable.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Assignments are unclear and grading seems arbitrary. Struggles to engage the class.

reviews.subject: Quantum Physics
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Dr. Hassan's patience and clear explanations make it manageable.

reviews.subject: Marketing Strategy
reviews.review: Prof. Chen's real-world examples and guest speakers make this course incredibly valuable.

reviews.subject: Microbiology
reviews.review: Content is interesting but the pace is too fast. More lab time would be beneficial.

reviews.subject: Constitutional Law
reviews.review: Prof. White's debates are thought-provoking. Challenging but rewarding course.

reviews.subject: Calculus II
reviews.review: Dr. Lee seems knowledgeable but struggles to explain concepts to students who are struggling.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Passionate and knowledgeable. Field trips and hands-on projects make this course outstanding.

reviews.subject: Spanish Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez's enthusiasm for the subject is evident. Encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Lectures are informative but could be more engaging. Exams are fair.

reviews.subject: Astrophysics
reviews.review: Mind-blowing course! Dr. Green makes complex topics accessible and fascinating.

reviews.subject: International Relations
reviews.review: Prof. Kovacs brings a wealth of experience. Discussions are always lively and informative.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Material is very difficult and Dr. Chen's teaching style doesn't help. Need more practice problems.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Prof. Garcia's passion for art is infectious. Virtual museum tours are a great addition.

reviews.subject: Machine Learning
reviews.review: Challenging but rewarding. Dr. Wilson provides great insights into real-world applications.

reviews.subject: Creative Writing
reviews.review: Provides good feedback, but could offer more diverse writing exercises and prompts.

reviews.subject: Russian Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Petrova's deep understanding and storytelling ability make this course unforgettable.

reviews.subject: Biochemistry
reviews.review: Clear explanations of complex topics. Prof. Chang is always willing to help outside of class.
